description:

In fact, Gage got so carried away with the dirty talk that I actually had to ask him to tone it down a bit because he was sounding like a full-fledged porn star! But I loved that he wanted to be nasty and it was fun watching him try...
Elijah, of course, loved every minute of it. He was hot for Gage and his big muscles from the get go and was really wanting Gage's cock up his ass. Elijah is the type of bottom who likes to be submissive and let the top take control, so Gage's aggressiveness was just perfect for him!
title: Gage & Elijah
